attributes.action: Ban illegal immigrants coming into the UK.
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair that people who have come into this country illegally are getting a lot of help whilst people who are not doing anything illegally are dealing with the: cost of living crisis, housing crisis and there seems to be very little help for these people.
attributes.background: Stop with the help towards people coming into the UK illegally. This way the government can focus on help towards people who live and work here instead.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

House all asylum seekers who entered the UK illegally in basic accommodation:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642143

Stop legal aid for people who entered the UK illegally: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642417
